title: DC/Leaved Game Response
body: Do you guys think there should be two different responses from the announcer for actually disconnecting and just straight up leaving the game? Would be nice to know whether someone rage quit from a game or just coincidentally left it. Thoughts?

replies.body:
I think it's a neat idea but could pose problems. For instance every now and then when my net crashes during a game I have to completely restart the league client to get it to re connect to the Internet. 

As far as the client is concerned I quit while it was trying to reconnect. 

I do think it's a nifty idea though. Might help with the pit in my stomach any time someone on my team disconnects in ranked.

Wouldn't really make any difference, though. If the player intentionally left, they're likely not coming back. If they got DCed, they'll likely try to reconnect. Not to mention, players could simply make it appear to be a DC rather than an intentional leave by turning of their modem or computer, disconnecting their internet connection etc. Even so, you can usually tell which it's likely to be by the way the player was acting prior to the DC/leave.

Not really any viable reason to implement it.
